34 2021 CORPORATE SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY REPORT
A foundational action for Amalgamated Bank’s climate commitments is 
maintaining net zero operations. For the fifth year in a row, we’ve succeeded in 
this commitment through our use of renewable energy in operations and offsets of the 
few emissions we do have, such as business travel and natural gas for heating. We are 
committed to transparently reporting our climate impacts from operations and the 
ways in which we achieve net zero operations. Following the GHG Protocol Corporate 
Accounting Standard, here are our 2021 GHG inventory results:
